statements: SELECT * FROM PatientData WHERE age > 50
SELECT patient_name, age FROM PatientData ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM PatientData WHERE diagnosis_code = 123
SELECT admission_date, discharge_date FROM PatientData WHERE patient_id = 100
SELECT * FROM PatientData WHERE admission_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28'
SELECT * FROM PatientData WHERE age > 50;
SELECT patient_name, admission_date, discharge_date FROM PatientData WHERE diagnosis_code = 123 ORDER BY admission_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis_code FROM PatientData WHERE admission_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM PatientData WHERE age < 18 AND diagnosis_code IN (456, 789);
SELECT * FROM PatientData WHERE age >= 30 ORDER BY diagnosis_code ASC, admission_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30
SELECT patient_id, gender FROM patients WHERE admission_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM predictions WHERE prediction_accuracy > 0.8
SELECT patient_id, prediction_accuracy FROM predictions WHERE predicted_admission_date > '2022-06-01'
SELECT gender, age FROM patients WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY admission_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT patient_id, gender FROM patients JOIN predictions ON patients.patient_id = predictions.patient_id WHERE predictions.prediction_accuracy > 0.9;
SELECT patient_id, age, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients JOIN predictions ON patients.patient_id = predictions.patient_id WHERE predictions.predicted_admission_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT AVG(age) AS avg_age, MAX(age) AS max_age, MIN(age) AS min_age FROM patients GROUP BY gender HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM patient_data WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, admission_date FROM patient_data WHERE admission_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT specialization, staff_name FROM medical_staff ORDER BY years_of_experience DESC;
SELECT resource_name, quantity, location FROM hospital_resources WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM patient_data WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, admission_date, diagnosis FROM patient_data WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM patient_data ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, admission_date FROM patient_data WHERE admission_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT staff_name, specialization, years_of_experience FROM medical_staff WHERE years_of_experience > 5 ORDER BY years_of_experience DESC;
SELECT resource_name, location, quantity FROM hospital_resources WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM patient_data;
SELECT patient_id, age, gender FROM patient_data WHERE age > 50;
SELECT patient_id, admission_date, discharge_date FROM admission_records ORDER BY admission_date DESC;
SELECT record_id, diagnosis FROM admission_records WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%pneumonia%';
SELECT allocation_id, resource_type, quantity, cost FROM resource_allocation WHERE cost > 5000 ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_data WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_id, gender FROM patient_data WHERE admission_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' ORDER BY admission_date ASC;
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis, treatment FROM admission_records WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%cancer%' ORDER BY record_id DESC;
SELECT patient_id, resource_type, quantity, cost FROM resource_allocation WHERE quantity >= 10 ORDER BY quantity DESC, cost ASC;
SELECT record_id, predicted_admission_rate, actual_admission_rate FROM forecasted_rates WHERE forecast_id < 100 ORDER BY forecast_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM patient_data;
SELECT patient_name, admission_date, admission_reason FROM patient_data ORDER BY admission_date DESC;
SELECT resource_name, quantity FROM resource_allocation WHERE resource_type = 'medical';
SELECT algorithm_name, accuracy FROM algorithm_parameters WHERE accuracy > 0.8;
SELECT patient_name, admission_date, admission_reason, admission_rate FROM patient_data WHERE admission_rate < 100;
SELECT * FROM patient_data;
SELECT patient_name, admission_date, admission_reason FROM patient_data ORDER BY admission_date DESC;
SELECT algorithm_name, accuracy FROM algorithm_parameters WHERE accuracy > 0.8;
SELECT r.resource_name, r.quantity, a.algorithm_name FROM resource_allocation r JOIN algorithm_parameters a ON r.resource_id = a.algorithm_id;
SELECT p.patient_name, f.forecast_date, f.forecasted_rate FROM patient_data p JOIN forecasted_rates f ON p.patient_id = f.patient_id;
